title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other open-source LLMs locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama into LangChain as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, model management, multi-user.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; DM or mention the bot to chat with local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper with prompts history, syntax highlighting, and REPL mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama; sync & async APIs, Spring Boot starter available.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI backend, Next.js chat, LangGraph agents, GPU Docker stacks, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors and auto-scaling.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight npm package that exposes a simple chat interface wrapper around ollama-js.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app for Ollama with session memory, model selector, and token-metrics sidebar.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + LangChain.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app for starting/stopping Ollama and switching models from the toolbar.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for summarizing notes and Q&A over your vault.
